data.text: @SDECoxHealth Not surprising considering the division and false information that was believed by half of the US population. It didn’t have to be this way.

@Golgo777 @Deulascar @SDECoxHealth thank you, Mr Edwards  - we are reading between the lines:( You’re our community hero here and beyond within the “Care Facility Administration Leadership Platforms” 🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌

@patriotrdb How each country accounts for deaths could be a factor as well. A better measure might be to look at excess deaths, which would tend to indicate that US and other countries have underestimated deaths. Russia for example has probably greatly underreported   https://t.co/fd1aQ5t7RR
@Golgo777 @SDECoxHealth I noticed that, aside from a little additional greed, entitlement, and hostility, most people returned to "normal" months ago.
@SDECoxHealth Could it be that the number of deaths is drastically inflated?

@Deulascar @SDECoxHealth We certainly should, but if history is our guide we'll learn basically nothing and shortly turn control of the country over to the very assholes who sabotaged our own response and caused so many Americans to die.
@SDECoxHealth Disgusting and shameful...we should be embarrassed as a country that we allowed this to happen.
